name: Uncraft World
description: Save the galaxy and its hot goddesses from eternal cubification ! Now with 50+ levels, Online play, 27 hero skins, Level Editor and Workshop integration !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Quadcore 2 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Meeting recommended requirements will make the level editor a lot smoother
